feed.noArticlesSubtitle: No articles available for this feed.

content.introduction: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing oncology by enabling earlier detection, more accurate diagnosis, and personalized treatments. This technological breakthrough represents a paradigm shift in how we approach cancer care.

diagnosticImaging.title: Diagnostic Imaging
diagnosticImaging.description: Computer vision algorithms analyze medical images (CT scans, MRIs, X-rays) to detect anomalies invisible to the naked eye. This technology is particularly effective for early lung cancer detection, mammography analysis for breast cancer, and skin biopsy examination for melanoma.

personalizedMedicine.title: Personalized Medicine
personalizedMedicine.description: AI enables treatment personalization by analyzing patient genetic profiles, medical history, specific tumor characteristics, and response to previous treatments.

results.title: Promising Results
results.description: Recent studies show encouraging results: 30% reduction in diagnostic errors, 25% improvement in 5-year survival rate, and reduction of side effects through personalized treatments.

challenges.title: Challenges and Perspectives
challenges.description: Despite these advances, several challenges remain: explainability of AI decisions, large-scale clinical validation, integration into existing hospital systems, and ethical and regulatory questions. The future looks promising with the emergence of new techniques like federated learning and multimodal AI.

about.title: Our Technology Watch
about.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence in Oncology: A systematic approach to tracking revolutionary innovations for MSPR 4

projectContext.title: MSPR 4 Project Context
projectContext.description: This technology watch is conducted as part of our MSPR 4 project (Professional Situation Methods and Practice). We are 4 developers responsible for monitoring and analyzing the latest advances in AI applications for oncology.

earlyDetection.title: Early Detection
earlyDetection.description: AI for automated cancer cell detection

personalizedTreatment.title: Personalized Treatment
personalizedTreatment.description: Precision medicine based on data analysis

team.title: Our Development Team
team.description: A multidisciplinary team of 4 developers covering technical, medical and ethical aspects:

items: Multiple RSS feeds covering several categories

multimodal.title: Multimodal AI
multimodal.description: Integration of medical imaging, genomic data and patient histories for holistic diagnosis

foundation.title: Foundation Models
foundation.description: Pre-trained models adaptable to different cancer types and imaging modalities

explainable.title: Explainable AI
explainable.description: Development of transparent systems for clinician and patient trust

edge.title: Edge Computing
edge.description: Deployment of embedded AI for real-time analysis during surgical interventions
